targets.expr:
(
  sum by (severity) (trivy_image_vulnerabilities{severity="Low", namespace=~"$namespace"})
    or
  sum by (severity) (trivy_image_vulnerabilities{severity="Medium", namespace=~"$namespace"})
    or
  sum by (severity) (trivy_image_vulnerabilities{severity="High", namespace=~"$namespace"})
    or
  sum by (severity) (trivy_image_vulnerabilities{severity="Critical", namespace=~"$namespace"})
)
